item.title: About
item.description: Hello there! My name is Fadi, and I work as a roboticist. Profile If you’d like to know more about my work and education, please refer to my resume, projects, GitHub, and Scholar. Contact You may contact me at fadi-alladkani@outlook.com or via my LinkedIn. Website I made this website with Hugo and Codex.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds. YouTube Privacy Enhanced Shortcode Twitter Simple Shortcode “In addition to being more logical, asymmetry has the advantage that its complete appearance is far more optically effective than symmetry.” — Jan Tschichold pic.twitter.com/gcv7SrhvJb — Graphic Design History (@DesignReviewed) January 17, 2019 Vimeo Simple Shortcode .
